pageContext.title: Lakeland Community Heritage Project Digital Archive
pageContext.description_excerpt: The Lakeland Community Heritage Project Digital Archive is a partnership between the Lakeland Community Heritage Project (LCHP), Dr. Mary Corbin Sies of University of Maryland's Department of American Studies, and MITH, to document an historic African American community before and after segregation and contribute to an understanding of urban renewal's impact on communities of color.
pageContext.participants: Andrew Fellows, Ed Summers, Maxine Gross, Stephanie Sapienza, Trevor Muñoz, Mary Corbin Sies
